channel.title: TuT request
channel.description:
ok im kinda new with coding some things... im alright in client, and i can do item.cfg and shops.cfg easy, but i need to know how i can add a shop in an isolated place. I want to make a tele command (which i know how to do) that only mods can use to get to that place, and buy mod equipment (such as a mod ring)
if anyone knows how to add a shop in a specific place, or even where the co-ordinates for an isolated place (that you cant get to by foot) is, please message me or post here

item.title: TuT request
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

You just put the npc in that isolated place. Then you make the npc open that shop.

Read full topic
